chunks.chunk_text: 我先騎白馬走三關親愛的金曲歌后徐嘉瑩你知道現在Uber Eats上什麼東西應該都點得到嗎那點得到白馬嗎點不到但點得到白紙那濕落沙粥呢你認真嗎算了那點個螃蟹砂鍋吧在Uber Eats上你想點的都點得到應該啦

chunks.chunk_text: Hi there歡迎收聽Look Back Sunday回顧星期天在這個節目John老師會彙整過去不同國家以及主題的熱門更多文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界時事趣聞Let's get started

chunks.chunk_text: The so-called media bargaining code
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科技業相關時事趣聞 All about tech industry.json

chunks.chunk_text: and publishers were negotiating payment for news content used on the tech firm sitesThe proposed legislation has reached a crunch point with widespread support in parliament where it is expected to be voted into law within daysIn recent yearstraditional media companies operating in Australiahave suffered huge hits to income streamsdue to dwindling subscriptions and advertisingFor every 100 Australian dollars spent on online advertising
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科技業相關時事趣聞 All about tech industry.json

chunks.chunk_text: in Australiaexcluding classifiedsnearly one third goes to Google and FacebookThe competition regulator has saidFacebook saidthat the law fundamentally misunderstands the relationshipbetween itself and publishersand it faces a starkchoice of attempting to complywith it or ban news contentIt said its platformgenerates billions of free referralsto Australian publisherswith significant sums to the media companiesAlphabet Inc.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科技業相關時事趣聞 All about tech industry.json

chunks.chunk_text: A wearable technologythat fits just like skin
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科技業相關時事趣聞 All about tech industry.json

chunks.chunk_text: It is almost certain that the next era of computing will be wearablesBut it is commensurately uncertainwhat these wearables will be and where on your body they will be wornApple and Samsung for exampleare betting on the wristGoogle the faceSome tech companies believe clothing will simply become electronicYet there is a whole new segment of startupsthat believes we humans will become the actual computers
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科技業相關時事趣聞 All about tech industry.json

chunks.chunk_text: Or at least the place where the technology will resideThese startups are working on a class of wearable computersThat adhere to the skin like temporary tattoosOr attach to the body like an adhesive bandageMany of these technologies are stretchable, bendable and incredibly thinThey can also be given unique designs to stand out like a bold tattooOr to blend in to the color of your skin
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科技業相關時事趣聞 All about tech industry.json

chunks.chunk_text: Or to make your skin look more beautifulOr to make your skin look more beautifulOr to make your skin look more beautiful
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科技業相關時事趣聞 All about tech industry.json

chunks.chunk_text: We have the smallest, most flexible, stretchable, wearable computerAnd you can collect all sorts of biometric data tied to your motionMC10 recently teamed up with John A. RogersA professor at the University of IllinoisAt Urbana-ChampaignWho has been working for nearly a decadeTo perfect flexible devicesThat can be worn on the skin or implantedHow would these gadgets
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科技業相關時事趣聞 All about tech industry.json

chunks.chunk_text: workMaybe you want to figure outwhich deodorantWould be best for youA sticker that tracks your sweat levelWould email you a few recommendationsOr if you want to monitor your baby's breathingA little sensor on the baby's chestWould alert you to any problemsWe'll eventually see a more intimateintegration of electronicsAnd biological systemsMr. Rogers saidWithout that kind of intimatephysical contactIt's going
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科技業相關時事趣聞 All about tech industry.json

chunks.chunk_text: To be difficultOr maybe even impossibleTo extract meaningful dataThe health applicationsAre enormousOver the past yearMr. RogersAnd his team of scientistsHave been workingWith patients with Parkinson's diseaseTo monitor their motionsWith dermatologistsTo treat skin diseasesAnd with beauty companiesLike L'OrealTo develop digital stickersThat track skin hydration

chunks.chunk_text: 和未来的美国总统总统的选举可能会有严重的影响它的解决是为了帮助研究者维持和维护技术而建立更多的深层谎言深层谎言的发展已经被迫使用在机械学习中

chunks.chunk_text: 使用点击和点击的技术去把一个人的脸披上其他人的脸上Facebook将资予10亿美元共同与微博和学校学员包括MIT、UC伯克利和奥斯佛大学设计公司正在发展深层谎言的解决挑战它将提供不具体的金融资予最好的解决方法
